ygData.subject: Re: A rose by any other name...
ygData.msgSnippet: Not pathetic. Just new. Tax season? My brother in law is a cpa, and at the end of tax season he looks like he has been beaten up. Try looking at alakhazam or
ygData.messageBody:
Not pathetic. Just new. Tax season? My brother in law is a cpa, and
at the end of tax season he looks like he has been beaten up.

Try looking at alakhazam or caster's realm for something on quests.
As to names, try out ones that are easy to type. makes it easier on
other players. My first druid had a long name. This one just started
as Barto. My warrior, Bartoo. My magician i called martondo, a bit
longer but easy to type, and the best I could think of at the time
that the game would accept.

Get some maps from the eq atlas, a link from alakhazam. I have quite
a few printed and in a binder for easy reference. better than getting
lost.

when playing solo you have to find your own play style. I tend to be
cautious, exploring with care and engaging mostly things that are
blue. My son's play a bit more boldly, less concerned with getting
killed. Though the one that is a mid-40's shadow knight has become a
bit more cautious after learning how expensive higher level deaths
can be.

Hey, and look into trade skills. a nice part of the game for those
who find it interesting. Some very high level quests require some
good trade skills, so they can be worthwhile, especially if you enjoy
pursuing the advancements. Not the same thrill as hack and loot, but
some of us find this aspect fun.

good hunting to you.
Barto Proudfoot

--- In EverQuest@y..., nara MKs <masterkiis_nara@y...> wrote:
>
> So many questions, so little time....am really bummed
> because with it being tax season and all I am not
> getting much game time...Is really hard for this
> newbie who is itching to play, play, play...Here is my
> question though...I already have two characters that I
> play with my boyfriend but am wanting to add a couple
> characters to play with when he is over at
> Fennin...While I am too afraid to play her now, I have
> thoughts of an Enchanter but am also thinking of a
> Druid character...I have a name for my Enchanter but
> am at a loss for something really creative for my
> Druid...Any suggestions on websites for research for a
> name? Guess I could go to Google but I thought I
> would check with you guys first. Also, any
> suggestions for a really easy quest for my Cleric?
> One I might be able to do fairly easily on my own? I
> have got to start learning this game on my own instead
> of just doing what HE tells me to do...you know, AUTO
> FOLLOW, ASSIST, Here take this..LOL...LOL...I keep
> running around Freeport afraid to go out cause I don't
> know if I could find my way back...I sound pathetic
> don't I?? :-)
>
>
> Naara, Barb Warrior
> Chryseas, High Elf Cleric
> Ayonae Ro
